document.full_text: the cleveland indians inflicted a 3-1 defeat on the boston red sox tuesday, the fourth loss on the spin to start the new season for a team tipped by many to win this year's world series.
document.title: red sox yanked down again in horror start
lines_and_colors: the cleveland indians inflicted a 3-1 defeat on the boston red sox tuesday, the fourth loss on the spin to start the new season for a team tipped by many to win this year's world series.
